name: Marshall Wace LLP
bossPosition: Global Head of Legal and Compliance
goal: Marshall Wace is a leading global alternative asset management company. Our reputation, built up over 20 years, is founded on the quality of our product offering, our people, a relentless drive for innovation, and our integrity.  We specialise in long/short equity strategies and combine fundamental investing with systematic and quantitative strategies to deliver returns from a range of investment solutions. Marshall Wace is supportive of the creation an effective global regulatory regime and seeks to contribute positively to the policy and legislative development process.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Single market
euInitiatives:
